replies.body: Not surprised that you're so impatient with the server.
replies.body_tagged: Not surprised that you're so impatient with the server.

replies.body:
Rule D9

Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone.

I don't want to be one of those guys but a Leaving post is meant to be a leaving post. If you're leaving then you should leave.

Making it an AMA and a leaving post is blatant attention seeking.

I don't want to be one of those guys but a Leaving post is meant to be a leaving post. If you're leaving then you should leave.

Making it an AMA and a leaving post is blatant attention seeking.
